Ben Hunt is the chief investment officer and co-founder of Second Foundation Partners, an independent financial research firm and registered investment adviser.
Ben Hunt is the creator of Epsilon Theory and inspiration behind Second Foundation Partners, which he co-founded with Rusty Guinn in June 2018.
